Whether you’re passionate about bringing people together, you want to help put blockchain technology to real world use or you’re just certain your portrait belongs on a page like this, we’d love to hear from you. We’re always looking for talented people to join our team.

Join our team

Partners

Founded in 2017, Binary District creates unique courses and events focused on new technologies - including blockchain, VR, AR, AI, cybersecurity, big data, IoT and machine learning. We work with Binary District to provide events for our community where our members can come together and meet like-minded people, learn, and collaborate on projects.

Visit website

The Research Institute supports us in the development of our innovative membership model and helps to improve user experience. Its R&D labs in Amsterdam, Moscow and Prague take a practical approach to technological development and their aim is to turn ideas into viable, real-world solutions.

Visit website
